extendedInfo.description: WARNING: MMS doesn't work currently, sorry! I don't really have time to fix it at the moment, but it works in the previous version available here: http://concentriclivers.com/android/Messaging-4.0.3-8.apkThis is the stock messaging (SMS & MMS) app from Android 4.1 Jellybean! The biggest improvements Google made in Jellybean are a new widget, photos in the notifications and a better recipient interface.Remember to disable your existing SMS app's notifications or you will get two notifications for each message.Please test the app to make sure it can send and receive messages correctly before relying on it! Test it a lot! Also if you are upgrading from the ICS version, PLEASE read the recent changes.If you appreciate this and my other totally free stock apps, consider sending me some money (via paypal)! I'm poor and hungry and it takes a long time to do this!KNOWN BUGS* Some incomplete phone numbers in the ComposeMessageActivity are deleted when you go to enter the message. I found the cause of this but there is not much I can do.* Contact photos may not sync properly. According to one user this is expected behaviour and it is basically Facebook's fault.* Widget is flickery when it loads. I looked into it. Can't find problem; may be Samsung's bug since it doesn't happen in emulator.* Widget "Show more conversations" button goes to the compose message activity instead of the message list. This is very weird.* SMS notifications might be unreliable for you. Test it a lot!* MMS doesn't work at all right now.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works like a charm, and fits into the phone like its second skin. Great to have if you\'re on Samsung phones with their ugly messaging interface, and things like Go Pro are just too cute.   This is the default messaging app till Google unifies sms with Hangouts.  Thanks Tim.
reviews.author: Karan Rajpal

reviews.title: Perfect, just need to fix some bugs.
reviews.comment: I\'m on the Galaxy S3, and I absolutely hate their stock messaging app. So this app was a life saver.   I just hope the notifications get fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Honestly I\'m not rating any apps I downloaded even though it\'s working unless it\'s awesome app and I really thought that this wouldn\'t work for my device so I  tried it and it work keep up the good  work :D I give it 5 star! \'cause I  really want an Stock Android jelly bean theme and app than nature Ux touchwiz
reviews.author: Yuuta Hideki

reviews.title: Cool even without the mms!
reviews.comment: Everything is good! Would be 5 stars upon activation of mms! Yeah would be uber nice if there is a dark theme for this one! At least an ics color theme. Kudos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
reviews.comment: Can you please base this app to the CM10 messaging app? The one with pictures and auto reply functionality in the notification shade. Add that and this would be the perfect alternative messaging app. 4-stars until then. I\'m on Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Jerald Lee

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: After the messaging app that came on mg spectrum 2 crashed and deleted itself, I looked at the play store and clicked on this app because it looked just like the messaging icon that came with my phone.   I installed and opened the app and to my surprise, all my old text messages were still there and I was able to send texts normally and easily.  I\'m very thankful for this app, this really helped!  Thank you!
reviews.author: Brandon Walsh

reviews.title: Good start!!! : D
reviews.comment: The idea is there, fantastic idea, fix the picture problem and just please always try to speed up the loading times before you add any fancy extras. The amount of time it takes to make send a text is always most important
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DRAINED BATTERY after upgrading to Android 4.3
reviews.comment: This app started to eat up my battery, the phone showed it was consuming 55% of the battery even when not in use!  So, I uninstalled and reinstalled it.  Keeping fingers crossed it will be ok from here on out...
reviews.author: Zorba Greekthe

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Amazing app, but PLEASE FIX THE FREAKING MMS! I will stick this back at 5 stars once you fix the mms  I hate the gs3 messaging app (coming from having the kyocera rise which uses the stock sms app), and this is soo much better. ;) glad that o have this app.
reviews.author: Kenneth Knight

reviews.title: Great but limited
reviews.comment: Great app, but will only sync with one of two Google accounts on my phone. Missing all contacts from the other account (which happens to be my main personal account)
reviews.author: Adam Simeone

reviews.title: good but still has plenty of room to be improved
reviews.comment: Thanks for the app...is would be great if the app can be kept in the memory so that it can start up faster. One problem, when multiple contacts is on the recipient column, it can scroll left or right to see the contacts, but some of the contacts are not able to see. Hope you can fix it soon.
reviews.author: JT Leong

reviews.title: Great Stocked Messaging App
reviews.comment: The app works pretty good except for the multimedia messaging issue. I\'m using a samsung galaxy note 2 and for some strange reason when I receive a mms on the native messaging app, it says in notification, \'hidden sender address\' and I cant delete it. Please fix!
reviews.author: Patrick Daley

reviews.title: Its amazing! But...
reviews.comment: Very good app! Love everything about it, but on my EVO 3D it keeps replacing the icon to the stock sense one and the counter won\'t go away until I open the stock app...but very well made otherwise!
reviews.author: Travis Roberson

reviews.comment: Superb
reviews.author: Joshua Gillette

reviews.title: HTC Desire s
reviews.comment: Thank you so so much for creating a good reliable messaging app. And thank you for letting it be free. :D 5 stars for me!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please mix MMS!!!
reviews.comment: This app would be 5 star worthy... Please fix mms asap... Otherwise ill have to uninstall. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Been using this app for a few days however I can\'t send any mms I have to go back to my stock msgr to do it which is a pain can you fix this please? Otherwise great job with this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this App
reviews.comment: I love this app, stock messenger is 10x better looking than touchwiz\'s messaging app.  Saves me from having to choose between looks or functionality as touchwiz has a lot of features.  And who uses MMS anyway? In UK where carriers still charge for MMS despite being on unlimited Tarrfis,  we\'ve grown accustomed to whatsapp or email for picture sharing.
reviews.author: Haydor Khan

reviews.title: Best app so far
reviews.comment: Awsum app for bundle app replacemnt....Can u plz add few more features in it...kind request
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works well, looks just like stock does. Is there any way to incorporate the notification expansion features in cm10?
reviews.author: Justin Lara
